N = int(input())
S = input()

c = S[0]
count = 1

for i in range(1, N):
    if c != S[i]:
        c = S[i]
        count += 1

print(count)

import sys

input = sys.stdin.readline

def main():
    n = int(input().rstrip())
    s = list(input().rstrip())

    ans = 0
    prev = s[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        if prev == s[i]:
            continue
        else:
            ans += 1
            prev = s[i]
    ans += 1
    print(ans)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

N = int(input())
S = list(input())

#print(N)
#print(S)

ans = 1
for i in range(N-1):
    if S[i] != S[i+1]:
        ans += 1

print(ans)

N = int(input())
S = input()

ans = 1
for i in range(1, N):
    if S[i-1] != S[i]:
        ans += 1

print(ans)
